execution_quality: The agent executed a single bash command cleanly without errors, providing verification of the current system state.
work_category: System state verification following a hardware troubleshooting attempt.
summary: Agent successfully executed a verification command to check the current system state. The user's follow-up reveals they discovered the actual problem independently—an external drive on the same USB dongle causing the issue.
follow_up_pattern: User's response reveals a potential root cause (external drive on the dongle), suggesting they discovered the issue independently while the agent was checking.
